Ensure the loading spinner's central x,y coordinates are identical to the parent container's center, opacity is 1.0 when visible, and it has a transparent background color

Confirm the user profile section displays the profile image with source 'profile_pic.jpg', natural dimensions 200x200px, rendered dimensions 100x100px, border radius 50%, and a 2px solid #007BFF border
Verify the user's name 'John Doe' is displayed with font size 24px, font weight 600, and a top margin of 10px
Verify the 'Edit Profile' button is enabled and has a background color of #6C757D
Verify the product card component has width 300px, height 450px, border radius 8px, 1px solid #E0E0E0 border, background color #FFFFFF, padding 15px, and bottom margin 25px
Verify the product title 'Stylish Backpack' has font size 20px and color #333333
Verify the price text '#49.99' has font weight 700
Ensure the pagination component displays a total count of 5 pages
Verify the current page button shows '3' with background color #007BFF and text color #FFFFFF
Verify the 'Previous' button is enabled if the current page is not 1
Verify each page number button has width 30px, height 30px, font size 14px, and is center aligned
Confirm the 'Next' button has aria-label 'Go to next page' and left margin 5px
Verify the 'Remember Me' checkbox is unchecked by default, its associated label displays the text 'Remember Me' with font size 14px and color #333333
Verify the 'Remember Me' checkbox element itself has width 18px, height 18px, 1px solid #CED4DA border, right margin 5px, and background color #FFFFFF when unchecked
Click the 'Remember Me' checkbox
Verify the 'Remember Me' checkbox becomes checked and its border color changes to #007BFF

Check the 'Success' toast notification is visible for 3s, has background color #28A745, text color #FFFFFF, displays the text 'Item added to cart successfully!' with font size 16px, appears at the top right corner of the viewport (right: 20px, top: 20px), fades out with an animation lasting 500ms, has width 350px, and padding 15px 20px
